verses.name: Deuteronomy 14:26
verses.text: And thou shalt bestow that money for whatsoever thy soul lusteth after, for oxen, or for sheep, or for wine, or for strong drink, or for whatsoever thy soul desireth: and thou shalt eat there before the Lord thy God, and thou shalt rejoice, thou, and thine household,

verses.name: Deuteronomy 14:27
verses.text: And the Levite that is within thy gates; thou shalt not forsake him; for he hath no part nor inheritance with thee.

verses.name: Deuteronomy 14:28
verses.text: At the end of three years thou shalt bring forth all the tithe of thine increase the same year, and shalt lay it up within thy gates:
